'''1.7.10''', the first release of the '''[[Ender Update]]''',<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360015936372|title=Minecraft: New Nintendo 3DS Edition - 1.7|date=September 19, 2018}}</ref> is a major update to {{el|ds}} that was released on September 19–20, 2018. Major additions included [[the End]], new [[Achievement/Legacy Console and New Nintendo 3DS editions|achievements]], and new [[mobs]] including the [[ender dragon]], [[shulker]]s, and [[polar bear]]s.

This is the first version to be released outside of North America and Japan.
